name: G560 Lightsync PC Gaming Speaker For All Games | Dell USA
description: Enjoy the latest games in living color. Logitech G LIGHTSYNC is next-gen RGB lighting. It’s powered by Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) and driven by games to synchronize with in-game action and controls of over 300 titles. Customize color for speakers at will from approx. 16.8 million brilliant colors. Even program your own advanced effects with LGS.
